title: Data Connection
description: Details of the data connection in RTCDP Collaboration

xdm:id.title: Id
xdm:id.description: The id of the data connection.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: The name of the data connection.

xdm:description.title: Description
xdm:description.description: The description of the data connection.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: The status of the data connection.

xdm:imsOrg.title: IMS Org
xdm:imsOrg.description: The IMS Organization ID associated with the data connection.

xdm:createdAtEpochMillis.title: Timestamp of Data Connection Creation
xdm:createdAtEpochMillis.description: The timestamp of when the data connection was created.

xdm:updatedAtEpochMillis.title: Timestamp of Data Connection Update
xdm:updatedAtEpochMillis.description: The timestamp of when the data connection was updated.

xdm:createdBy.title: Created By
xdm:createdBy.description: The user or system that created the data connection.

xdm:ownerCollaboratorId.title: Owner Collaborator ID
xdm:ownerCollaboratorId.description: The owner collaborator ID for the data connection.

xdm:updatedBy.title: Updated By
xdm:updatedBy.description: The user or system that last updated the data connection.

xdm:version.title: Version
xdm:version.description: The version of the data connection.

xdm:sourceType.title: Source Type
xdm:sourceType.description: The source of data involved with the data connection.

xdm:type.title: Data Connection Type
xdm:type.description: The type of data that is involved with the data connection.

xdm:isEgress.title: Egress Data Connection
xdm:isEgress.description: Determines if the data connection is an egress data connection.

xdm:isSystem.title: System Data Connection
xdm:isSystem.description: Determines if the data connection is a system data connection.

xdm:fieldMappings.title: Field Mappings
xdm:fieldMappings.description: Mappings from source namespaces to target namespaces.

xdm:sourceName.title: Source Field Name
xdm:sourceName.description: The name of the source field.

xdm:targetName.title: Target Field Name
xdm:targetName.description: The name of the target field.

xdm:matchKey.title: Match Key
xdm:matchKey.description: Boolean to determine whether the field is a match key or not.

xdm:transformation.title: Transformation
xdm:transformation.description: Transformation functions between the source and target namespace.

xdm:type.title: Field Relationship Type
xdm:type.description: Type of field relationship (currently used for activation mapping).

xdm:scheduleSettings.title: Schedule Settings
xdm:scheduleSettings.description: The schedule settings for the data connection.

xdm:startDateEpochMillis.title: Start Date
xdm:startDateEpochMillis.description: The start date of the data connection.

xdm:endDateEpochMillis.title: End Date
xdm:endDateEpochMillis.description: The end date of the data connection.

xdm:frequency.title: Data Export Frequency
xdm:frequency.description: The frequency of which data will be exported.

xdm:matchKeyToUseCaseSettings.title: Match Key Use Case Settings
xdm:matchKeyToUseCaseSettings.description: Use case configuration for each match key.

xdm:id.title: Match Key Type
xdm:id.description: The name/id of the match key.

xdm:discover.title: Discover Use-case
xdm:discover.description: Determines if the match key can be used for discover purposes.

xdm:share.title: Share Use-case
xdm:share.description: Determines if the match key can be used for share purposes.

xdm:activate.title: Activate Use-case
xdm:activate.description: Determines if the match key can be used for activate purposes.

xdm:measure.title: Measurement Use-case
xdm:measure.description: Determines if the match key can be used for measurement purposes.
